Package googol.barrel

Class ISBs

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
googol.barrel.ISBs
All Implemented Interfaces:
IISBs, Serializable, Remote
public class ISBs extends UnicastRemoteObject implements IISBs
Class that represents the implementation of the IISBs interface It provides methods for managing the inverted index and handling client requests
See Also:
